name: Gif Game Challenge Tap & Play
description:
The game is simple... just tap on the screen and pause it in the exact moment your Gif matches with the outline of the screen. Sound easy? It's not!

Play in timed gameplay where you can share your progress and stats with your friends, or in casual mode which allows you to play with no pressure.

Can YOU complete the GifGameChallenge? Give it a try and find out and have fun!
